name: Syber Chase
description:
Made for the Voxelles, IDGA, and Sugar Gamers sponsored Spooky Game Jam 2017. 

Take on the mantle of the famed hacker "Syber Chase" and their best buddy as they traverse the series of tubes that is the old and new internet. Too bad they've stuck their fingers where they don't belong.

A combination between a local multiplayer party game and a survival horror-style chase surely more likely to make you laugh than cower in fear.
